name: Steris plc
description: Steris plc is a leading provider of infection prevention and other procedural products and services. Founded in 1985, the company is headquartered in Dublin, Ireland, and operates globally, serving healthcare, pharmaceutical, and research markets. Steris is dedicated to enhancing patient safety and improving healthcare outcomes through innovative and reliable solutions. The company offers a comprehensive range of products, including sterilization equipment, surgical instruments, and cleaning solutions, aimed at preventing infection and contamination in various settings. With a strong emphasis on research and development, Steris continually innovates to meet the evolving needs of healthcare professionals. The company's services also include consulting, training, and maintenance to ensure that healthcare facilities operate at the highest standards. Steris is committed to sustainability and corporate social responsibility, striving to reduce its environmental impact while delivering value to its customers and stakeholders. As the healthcare landscape evolves, Steris remains at the forefront of developing solutions that enhance operational efficiency and improve patient care.
